entry.title: [Proposal] 64-bit arithmetic in Script
entry.summary: In a recent communication among members of the machine learning community, concerns were raised regarding the Global Standards Repository (GSR), specifically about its announcement status within the mailing list. The sender, Christian, acknowledged that they had previously mentioned the GSR in conversations, under the assumption that it had been formally announced to the group. Upon realizing this was not the case, and thereby inadvertently positioning it as a competing initiative, Christian expressed apologies for any confusion or disruption caused. This incident highlights an oversight in communication channels within the community, leading to Christian's hope that a detailed update on the GSR's concept and progress will be shared with the group in the near future. This situation underscores the importance of clear and verified communications, especially in collaborative and rapidly evolving fields such as machine learning and blockchain technology.
